import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; //images import { IMG01, IMG02, IMG03, IMG04, IMG05, IMG06, IMG07 } from './img.jsx'; //components import RecentStories from './recentstories'; import { JobContext } from "../../../context/jobs"; import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser'; function SuccessStory() { const { id } = useParams(); const { successStories } = useContext(JobContext); const story = successStories.find((item) => { return item.id === parseInt(id); }); console.log(story); const { photo, name, type, success_story, story_image } = story; const storyUrl = story_image ? `http://excodeteam.com/crs/public/images/${story_image}` : IMG01; const photoUrl = photo ? `http://excodeteam.com/crs/public/images/${photo}` : IMG01; return ( <>
  1. Home
  2. Success Stories

); } export default SuccessStory;
